medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain started yesterday at 4 PM, accompanied by anorexia and some nausea (not today). Pain intensified while driving over bumps but did not increase with movement in the ED. Pain on deep breathing noted. Duration of symptoms is less than 24 hours.
